CRITERIA.Item: Real-time telemetry visualization for P800 wargame operations
Sub-200ms latency requirement for operational awareness

Block.name: BENSON_EXECUTION_ACTIVATION
Block.COMMAND: Coordinate visualization layer. Enforce 200ms lag kill-switch. Bind to Redis attack stream.

Block.name: GOVERNANCE_MODE_ACTIVATION
Block.LOGIC: Blackout Protocol triggers if telemetry lag exceeds 200ms hard ceiling.

Block.name: GOVERNANCE_MODE_ACKNOWLEDGMENT
Block.ASSERTION: War Room dashboard instantiated. Hexagon heatmap bound to V1-V4 intensity.
Cryptographic signature verification active on all telemetry packets.

Block.name: AGENT_ACKNOWLEDGMENT
Block.STATUS: War Room visualization layer active. WebSocket secured. Telemetry flowing.

Block.name: CONTEXT
Block.BASELINE: Real-time visibility into P800 attack vectors required for operational command. Blackout Protocol enforces hard latency ceiling.

Block.name: GOAL_STATE
Block.TARGET: Sub-200ms end-to-end telemetry latency. Zero unsigned frames. 100% attack vector coverage.

Block.name: CONSTRAINTS_AND_GUARDRAILS
Block.MUST_NOT: Allow unsigned telemetry packets to render on dashboard.
Block.MUST: Terminate WebSocket if lag exceeds 200ms (Blackout Protocol).
Maintain cryptographic integrity for all telemetry data.

Block.name: TASKS_AND_PLAN
Block.Task: PNL-01: Deploy hexagonal heatmap for V1-V4 attack intensity visualization.
PNL-02: Instantiate gauge cluster for kernel vitals (CPU panic, memory pressure, SCRAM proximity).
PNL-03: Create time-series chart for Sentinel validation window latency (158ms ceiling).
Pipeline: Secure WebSocket binding to Redis attack stream.
Security: Enforce cryptographic signature verification on all telemetry packets.

Block.name: TRAINING_SIGNAL
Block.REINFORCEMENT_VECTOR: Operational dashboard; no training signal required.

Block.name: POSITIVE_CLOSURE_AND_FINAL_STATE
Block.FINAL_STATE: War Room dashboard operational. All panels active. Telemetry verified.

Block.name: LEDGER_COMMIT_AND_ATTESTATION
Block.COMMIT: War Room deployment authorized by JEFFREY for P800 operational visibility.

Block.name: HUMAN_SUPREMACY_ACK
Block.ATTESTATION: Operational telemetry serves human command oversight of wargame operations.
